    • rentARoom

      public int[] rentARoom​(int number, int index, int type, int servers, int day, int mounth, int year)
      Rent a room
      Parameters:
      number - is the number of the room
      index - is the index of the company or project
      type - 1 if is a company, 2 if is a project
      servers - is the amount of servers
      day - is the day of the reserve
      mounth - is the mount of the reserve
      year - is the year of the reserve
      Returns:
      position is the position where the reserve was realized position 0 to colum and position 1 to row

    • addServers

      public void addServers​(int[] miniRoom, double cache, double ram, double disksCapacity, int numDisks, int processors, int indexBrand)
      add a server
      Parameters:
      miniRoom - is the position where the server will be added
      cache - is the cache memorie of the server
      ram - is the ram of the server
      disksCapacity - is the memorie of each disk
      numDisks - is the number of disks
      processors - is the number of processors
      indexBrand - is the index of the brand of the processor
